mapper.select: select a.*,b.wri_name,c.gr_name from book_info a left outer join writer_info b on a.bi_wri_seq = b.wri_seq left outer join genre_info c on a.bi_gr_seq = c.gr_seq where bi_seq = #{seq}
select bc_seq as seq,bc_img_file as book_covers from book_cover_info where bc_bi_seq = #{seq}
select bcon_page as 'order', bcon_text as content from book_content_info where bcon_bi_seq = #{seq}
select bt_text_file from book_text_info where bt_bi_seq = #{seq}
select a.*,b.rd_seq ,b.rd_id ,b.rd_nickname from book_reply a left outer join reader_info b on a.bre_rd_seq = b.rd_seq where bre_bi_seq = #{seq} order by bre_seq desc limit 10
select ceil(count(*)/10) from book_reply where bre_bi_seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_reply (bre_bi_seq, bre_rd_seq, bre_text, bre_reg_dt, bre_mod_dt) VALUES (#{bre_bi_seq}, #{bre_rd_seq}, #{bre_text}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
